For Sale: $350 OBO PayPal goods Shipped

1906 V.O. Hammon Chicago Cubs Pennant Winners Postcard.

This is a fairly rare postcard with all the Cubs big names at the time from Tinker to Evers to Chance as well as Mordecai Brown! 

It is graded a 1 due to the back writing.

Thanks!
